body:
Hey,
So, recently Zeus had been having lots of thoughts regarding the server. School will be starting up soon and this is an important year for him. In addition, he's spent pretty much 2-3 years on here, and has been staff for almost 2 of them. Through thick and thin, he's tried to stay close to the server. However, recently he has felt no motivation to fix anything on the server, and his time is now up. Additionally, he has some things he needs to get done other than school in his life and not having the burden of being Administrator will be a start. No, he is not leaving. He'll still be pretty active, just not as staff. It’s really been a pleasure working with everyone for such a long time.
body_tagged:
Hey,
So, recently Zeus had been having lots of thoughts regarding the server. School will be starting up soon and this is an important year for him. In addition, he's spent pretty much 2-3 years on here, and has been staff for almost 2 of them. Through thick and thin, he's tried to stay close to the server. However, recently he has felt no motivation to fix anything on the server, and his time is now up. Additionally, he has some things he needs to get done other than school in his life and not having the burden of being Administrator will be a start. No, he is not leaving. He'll still be pretty active, just not as staff. It’s really been a pleasure working with everyone for such a long time.
title: Zeus' Retirement.

replies.body:
Even though I gave you stick, and been a fucking bitch to you two lately. I still remember the golden days, Peachy, you're the person who granted me my second chance and trust in me. Zeus, what can I say. An absolute brother to me, a brother that I never had. We were so close, it was unbelievable. Thank you, for everything.

The complete douche,
Ambivalence_

replies.body:
Peachy and Zeus,
You guys did great as admins, and I really hope school goes great for you guys. Thank you for everything you've done! It's going to be really weird seeing you two without staff ranks, but I respect your decision. Thank you once again guys <3
replies.body_tagged:
Peachy and Zeus,
You guys did great as admins, and I really hope school goes great for you guys. Thank you for everything you've done! It's going to be really weird seeing you two without staff ranks, but I respect your decision. Thank you once again guys <3

replies.body:
You guys were amazing admins and you've done your best for the server and that's all we can ask of you. I'm sorry things had to come to a sticky ending, I truly am. :(
 
Peachy
You've been over 2 years and through thick and thin and yet still stayed loyal to Avicus/McZone and that is true commitment. The senior mod rank expectations were set by you: Amount of appeals, online reports, staff apps, support emails, in game questions, in game reports... the list goes on and that list was made by you! Your hard work towards Avicus, and if things were... different, I'll say, you would be sprinkling your magic pixie dust all over Avicus every day like bloody peter pan! 

Zeus
... you're a fucking legend.

rip the dream
